title: help!
body: I want to change my password, but i forgot the email that i used to created my account. How can i change my password?

replies.body: Account security is pretty important, and we do have some ways to recover your account through our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide.  If you're unable to regain access to your email, reach out to us in a support ticket so our account team can help.  We may need to verify ownership to assist, but we'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!
I did send a ticket, but I haven't received a respond yet.  XD
